CustomField.description:
Provide custom Condition Expression String for evaluation. Supported Boolean functions are AND, OR , XOR, NOT
example: (#1 OR #2) AND (#3 OR #4)
Use #ConditionIndex pattern.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Provide custom Condition Expression String for evaluation. Supported Boolean functions are AND, OR , XOR, NOT
example: (#1 OR #2) AND (#3 OR #4)
Use #ConditionIndex pattern.
CustomField.label: Advanced Condition
